channel.title: update on LJ-Left Creations Blog
channel.description: Recent content in update on LJ-Left Creations Blog

item.title: Pythagorised Score Up
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: Play Pythagorised Scoreup! This is my game, Pythagorised Scoreup, built with Pygame and running in your browser thanks to Pygbag! Choose 10 cards for the base, then another 10 for the height. Your final score is the square root of the ‘square of the hypotenuse equalling to the sums of the squares on the other two sides’. E.g. Base score is 3, Height score is 4, Hypotenuse and your score is 5 (âˆš(3Â² + 4Â² = 25))

item.title: Shake to Quack
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: ðŸ¦†ðŸ¦† Play it here: https://thatisdrtruman.github.io/shake_to_quack_html/ For Android users, Download You can also see how I made ‘Shake To Quack’ with Godot 3.5.3 with C# Support. https://github.com/thatisdrtruman/shake-to-quack How I decided to make it One day on Tiktok, I came across a Tokyo Disneyland Glu Glu Quacking Stick for the theme park’s Quacky City event, celebrating Donald Duck’s 90th anniversary. For a while, I wanted to make a game or an app on Godot and with C#, and I decided to prove myself I can code in C#, with an app version of the Stick.

item.title: Fillup Status App 1.3
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: This is the fourth post to ‘Fillup’, to see the first post about it, go here, the second here, or the third To download the APK, go here, iOS coming soon, but now have a browser version: Site for web app I now added ten checkboxes to mark in your player’s inventory. Whether you already have one of the items and/or abilities. And there is a new Coordinate generator.

item.title: Fillup Status Site
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: Fillup-status-app but in a browser, internet required: Your HP: 20 Roll Moves Roll Coordinates Your coordinates: , Your abilities: Stomp Block Slide Teleport Triple Punch Your items: Lasoo Wall Mine Spear HP Bottle (Use: +5HP) To download the Android APK, go here, if you’re on PC and want to play it offine, save this page as a single file

item.title: Fillup Status App 1.1
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: UPDATE 01/02/2024: Download now at fillup-status-app-1.2 This is the third post to ‘Fillup’, to see the first post about it, go here, the second here To download the APK, go here, iOS coming soon, but now I have a browser version: Site for web app I now added two EditText boxes to mark in your player’s coordinates, bolded the title and slightly condense them features together. The HP bar (the number changes as you use the slider)
